        Initialize an active mode channel for file transmission
        Parameters:
        fs - FtpSessionHandler object
        responseCtx - A ChannelHandlerContext for sending file transfer result to client
        mode - Transfer mode
        fileName - The file to be sent to client

        Parameters:
        fs - FtpSessionHandler object
